alert.note: Alert for Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 5:51PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Luna County through 615 PM MDT... At 550 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hermanas. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hermanas, Carzalia Valley and Camp Ramsey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
